itunes:title: Episode 466 - Mat's Book Is Finally Out Today!
title: Episode 466 - Mat's Book Is Finally Out Today!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are live from Wilmington, NC and New York City to celebrate Mat's book release today for "Thank You For My Service".  The book is currently #11 in the world and #3 in new releases, please help us ...
itunes:summary:
Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are live from Wilmington, NC and New York City to celebrate Mat's book release today for "Thank You For My Service".  The book is currently #11 in the world and #3 in new releases, please help us get it to #1 in the world! You can buy it at book stores everywhere and Amazon!

description:
Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, Ross Patterson, and Dan Hollaway are live from Wilmington, NC and New York City to celebrate Mat's book release today for "Thank You For My Service".  The book is currently #11 in the world and #3 in new releases, please help us get it to #1 in the world! You can buy it at book stores everywhere and Amazon!
